result.title: Sessions #9&#12 â€” Search Techniques
result.content:
AlSalam Allaikum all,

During these 2 sessions we have discussed the following topics:

  • Binary Search
  • Ternary Search
  • Complete Search (with popular prunes)
  • Meet in the Middle

You can find useful resources through the following:

  • Coach Mahmoud Radwan's slides on Binary Search and Ternary Search.
  • Wikipedia's Articles on Binary Search and Ternary Search.
  • TopCoder's tutorial on Binary Search.
  • USACO's Tutorial on Complete Search.
  • Coach Mahmoud Radwan's slides on Complete Search and Meet in the Middle.

The tasks for these sessions are now live, you can start solving here https://a2oj.com/register?ID=27199
